contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111430000.text: I tried to send you lots of texts but none of them went through. Are you getting a bad signal at your location?

111430001.text: Are you the real Regin? I'm kinda doubting your identity right now. After all, I can't see your face when we are texting!

111430002.text: Huh? What are you talking about? How can there be a fake Regin in this world? Did you hit your head too hard?

111430003.text: I won't tell you anything unless you give me the passphrase we agreed on.

111430004.text: Passphrase? What passphrase? "Long Live the Supreme Guardian"? "I wanna be a Silvermane Guard too"? Hold on. We never agreed on something like that!

111430005.text: What happened to you? Did you have an accident? Don't go anywhere! I'll send you some money right now!

111430006.text: I didn't think you'd be such a good friend. I'm so touched... You're definitely the real Regin!

111430007.text: Adding compensation when there's danger... Seems like you're the real deal. Appraisal complete.

111430008.text: You seem fine to me as well...? Never mind. I won't press you for what happened this time. Just come back and have a rest!

111430009.text: When you have time, can you come back after resting up so we can have a chat face-to-face?
